summary: Allows you to save up to 8 different outfits for favorite NPCs.
descriptionHtml:
[B]DESCRIPTION:[/B]
So many beautiful armor sets and just Dovahkiin alone to dress up? That's not cool.
This mod allows you to save up to 8 different outfits for favorite NPCs. Relationship rank towards NPC must be 1 or greater* (friend, spouse etc).

[B]INSTALLATION AND USAGE:[/B]
1. Unpack archive to your Data folder, enable mod.
2. Talk to friendly NPC with relationship rank 1 to 4. If no profile, new one will be created. Max number of profiles in this version is limited to 8.
3. Ð¡hoose any outfit slot.
4. Press "Edit" button to add or remove items. Only armor, clothes and weapons are allowed. 16 items max.
5. Press "Main" to set outfit as NPC's main outfit or clear main outfit.
6. "Sleep" button - NPC will wear this clothes while sleeping.
7. "Local" button - sets outfit as default for current location.
8. "Forced" button - forces NPC to wear this outfit for 6 game hours.

[u]Outfits priority:[/u]
1. Forced (if set less then 6h ago)
2. Sleep (if set and NPC is asleep)
3. Local (if set for current location)
4. Main (if set)
5. NPCs default clothing

[b]SION'S CODE:[/b]
All my mods/programs are safe to try and safe to delete at any moment. Vanilla records are changed only if there is no other way. Maximum performance and compatibility.
author: Sion

files.name: Dress up your friends v031
files.changelogHtml: When choosing to delete profile, all items of all outfits will be returned to player.

files.name: Dress up your friends v033
files.changelogHtml:
Changed filter to allow any equippable items including strange things from other mods.
No other changes.
